entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: WSW 38 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
